Package tleibert.yahtzee.model

Class ScoreCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tleibert.yahtzee.model.ScoreCard
  • public class ScoreCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the scorecard for one player in Yahtzee. This class handles the scoring of the various dice configurations in Yahtzee.
    Author:
    Trevor Leibert

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BONUS_SCORE_POINTS
      amount of bonus points to add for the upper score bonus

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScoreCard

        public ScoreCard()
        Constructor for the ScoreCard class. A new ScoreCard will have its scores set to zero, and all boolean variables set to false.

    • Method Detail

      • score

        public int score​(DiceBlock dice,
                 int scoringType)
        This method scores a given set of dice, based on the scoring criteria selected by the player. It will add the score gained to the player's total score, as well as returning the amount of points that were added.
        Parameters:
        dice - a DiceBlock object representing the dice that will be scored.
        scoringType - the selected criteria of scoring the dice.
        Returns:
        the score given by this call of the method. Will be zero if the scoring requirements for the chosen criteria of scoring were not met.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if scoring type isn't between 0 and 12 (inclusive)

      • getHadBonusScore

        public boolean getHadBonusScore()
        Returns if a user has recieved bonus score or not.
        Returns:
        true if the player has recieved bonus points, false if they have not.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns the user's current total score.
        Returns:
        the total score.
